mapper.select: select mo_att_no , emp_no , att_no , mo_att_reason , mo_att_back , mo_att_status , mo_att_type , to_char(mo_att_enroll_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_enroll_d" , to_char(mo_att_modify_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_modify_d" , mo_read_flag from tb_modify_att where emp_no = #{empNo} and mo_att_delete_flag = 'O' order by mo_att_enroll_d desc

select mo_att_no , m.emp_no , a.att_no , mo_att_reason , nvl(mo_att_back, '아직 사유가 작성되지 않았습니다.') as "mo_att_back" , mo_att_status , mo_att_type , to_char(mo_att_enroll_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_enroll_d" , to_char(mo_att_modify_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_modify_d" , mo_read_flag , e.emp_name , nvl(e.emp_photo, 'resources/profile_images/defaultProfile.png') as "emp_photo" , g.gr_name , nvl(a.att_in, '출근전') as "att_in" , nvl(a.att_out, '퇴근전') as "att_out" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(a.att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(a.att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')), 1) * 24),2 ,'0'), '00') as "gapHour" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(a.att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(a.att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), '00') as "gapMinute" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(a.att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(a.att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24 * 60, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), '00') as "gapSecond" , a.att_status , to_date(a.att_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as "att_date" , nvl(mo_att_modify_time, '00:00:00') as "mo_att_modify_time" from tb_modify_att m join tb_emp e on(e.emp_no = m.emp_no) join tb_grade g on (e.emp_grade = g.emp_grade) join tb_att a on (a.att_no = m.att_no) where mo_att_no = #{moAttNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_modify_att ( mo_att_no , emp_no , att_no , mo_att_reason , mo_att_back , mo_att_status , mo_att_type , mo_att_enroll_d , mo_att_modify_d , mo_read_flag , mo_att_delete_flag ) values ( SEQ_MOATT_NO.nextval , #{empNo} , #{attNo} , #{moAttReason} , null , 'W' , #{moAttType} , sysdate , #{attDate} , 'N' , 'O' )
mapper.select: select mo_att_no , m.emp_no , att_no , mo_att_reason , mo_att_back , mo_att_status , mo_att_type , to_char(mo_att_enroll_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_enroll_d" , to_char(mo_att_modify_d,'yyyy/mm/dd') as "mo_att_modify_d" , mo_read_flag , emp_name , emp_photo , gr_name from tb_modify_att m join tb_emp e on (e.emp_no = m.emp_no) join tb_grade g on (e.emp_grade = g.emp_grade) where mo_att_delete_flag = 'O' order by mo_att_enroll_d desc
